on.name: on
on.description: Sets the user as available for receiving calls.

off.name: off
off.description: Sets the user as unavailable for receiving calls.

default.name: default
default.description: Sets the user as unavailable for receiving calls.

admincontactinfo.name: admincontactinfo
admincontactinfo.description: Returns contact info for the system administrator.

manual.name: manual
manual.description: Gets help manual for a command, or lists all commands if used by itself.

status.name: status
status.description: Gets status for user and system.

setadminpassword.name: setadminpassword
setadminpassword.description: Authorizes specified user for admin task and sets initial password.

sendall.name: sendall
sendall.description: Sends a text message to all users.

sendusername.name: sendusername
sendusername.description: Sends a text message to a user by name.
